OrgName.entry: ENVIRONMENT AGENCY CUSTOMER CONTACT CENTRE - FISHING

AltName.entry: THE ROD LICENSING TEAM, NATIONAL CUSTOMER CONTACT CENTRE, THE ENVIRONMENT AGENCY

Desc.entry: Anyone aged 12 years or over who fishes for salmon, trout, freshwater fish or eels, in England or Wales must have an Environment Agency Rod Fishing Licence. Licences are available from all post offices, the Environment Agency website and by telephone using a credit card, Tel: 0844 800 5386 or through Direct Debit, Tel: 0870 850 6506. Licences can be bought for 1 day, 8 days or for the licence season (1st Apr-31st Mar). Concessions are available for juniors aged 12-16 years inclusive, senior citizens aged 65 and over, blue badge holders and people receiving Disability Living Allowance.
